Package org.ngi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bounds
    Bounding box class for 2d objects.
    DialogFileFilter
    Dialog file filter class for use with standard swing dialogs.
    DragConnectorTool
    Drag connector tool for handling click and drag connection operations between nodes.
    Element
    Base Class for common graphical entities.
    FileHandler
    File IO Handling helper to remove the file functions from the main body.
    InfoPanel
    Information panel to used display information about Nodes, Inputs and Outputs on mouse overs.
    InputUtilities
    Input utilities for various common testing and string formatting functions.
    MouseFocus
    Mouse over results object.
    Node
    Base class for all Nodes.
    NodeConnection
    Connection between a NodeInput and NodeOutput.
    NodeGraph
    NodeGraph is a node graph interface for OpenSCAD.
    NodeGraphInterface
    Java Node Graph application.
    NodeGraphInterfaceUI
    This is the UI parent class JFrame for the application.
    NodeInput
    Base Class for all Node Inputs.
    NodeOutput
    Base class for all NodeOutputs.
    NodeTile
    Base Class for NodeINputs and NodeOutputs that handles all the graphics functions.
    PanelCamera
    Utility for Panels to handle pan and zoom.
    TerminalNodeList
    List class to hold terminal nodes as the child chain is resolved in the evaluation process.
